metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12412 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw in the libapreq2 v2.07 to v2.13 multipart parser can deference a null pointer leading to a process crash. A remote attacker could send a request causing a process crash which could lead to a denial of service attack. It was discovered that libapreq2 did not properly sanitize the Content-Type field in certain, crafted HTTP requests. An attacker could use the vulnerability to cause libapreq2 to crash.

criterions.comment: libapreq2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
